Package Models

Class Phase

  • java.lang.Object
    • Models.Phase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IssueOrderPhase, OrderExecutionPhase, StartUpPhase
    public abstract class Phase
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface that enforces the method requirement for Each Game Phase.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Phase​(GameEngine p_gameEngine, GameState p_gameState)
      Constructor to initialize the value of current game engine.

        public void handleCommand​(java.lang.String p_enteredCommand)
                   throws InvalidMap,
                          InvalidCommand,
                          java.io.IOException

        p_enteredCommand - command entered by the user in CLI
        Throws:
        InvalidCommand - indicates command is invalid
        InvalidMap - indicates map is invalid
        java.io.IOException - indicates failure in I/O operation
